article: saddam hussein made $ ## billion in illegal income and eroded the world 's toughest economic embargo during his final years as iraq 's leader through shrewd schemes to secretly buy off dozens of countries , top foreign officials and major international figures , said a new report by the chief u.s. weapons inspector released wednesday .
